Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Organic Chemical/Organic Solvents/1,9-Nonanediol
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An aliphatic alcohol (with nine carbon atoms and two hydroxyl groups at positions 1 and 9) used in chemical synthesis and biomedical research. 1,9-Nonanediol suppresses glycine currents in neurons; glycine is a major inhibitory neurotransmitter in the mature mammalian central nervous system. (NCI04)
